Articles.Content:
In this game we try to whack a kerbal in more creative ways 

ex fly a rocket I to the kerbal

i will start drop an asteroid onto the kerbal

I drop the kerbal into jool

/thread

well depending on your frame of reference, you can say that you dropped Jool onto the Kerbal. I'll up you one: I drop Kerbol onto the kerbal ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
I drop a round potato onto the Kerbal.
I threw the kerbal out the airlock into a hammer.
I throw a hammer into an airlock hitting the kerbel

> 
> I throw a hammer into an airlock hitting the kerbel

I throw an airlock into the kerbal hitting the hammer.

What?
I'm gonna head butt ya! I'm gonna headbutt ya!
I drop him head first from 900000 Obove tylo
